name: LegalEntityIdentifier
documentation: An association, corporation, partnership, proprietorship, trust, or individual that has legal standing in the eyes of the law. A legal entity has legal capacity to enter into agreements or contracts, assume obligations, incur and pay debts, sue and be sued in its own right, and to be held responsible for its actions.

nodes.name: ClassificationSetName
nodes.documentation: The Name or standard abbreviation for this Classification Set.

nodes.name: EventStatus
nodes.documentation: The state or status of this Corporate Event.

nodes.name: LEtoCountryRelationshipType
nodes.documentation: Indicates how this Country is related to the Legal Entity.

nodes.name: FinancialInfoEndDate
nodes.documentation: The latest or end of period date this Financial Info had effect.

nodes.name: PhoneNumber
nodes.documentation: The phone number associated with this Address ID

nodes.name: LEAddressEndDate
nodes.documentation: A Date after which a Legal Entity Address is no longer active.

nodes.name: ZIPPostalCode
nodes.documentation: Free form text  with well defined format and domain of values for different countries

nodes.name: LegalEntityName
nodes.documentation: The legal, official name for this LE expressed in English. Additional names for the Legal Entity, if required, are stored on separate occurrences of Legal Entity Alternate Name including the Legal Entity Name expressed in its native language.

nodes.name: HierarchyLevelNumber
nodes.documentation: Indicates the strata in which this Category is ranked. The top-most strata is "1", the second level is "2", etc. All Categories within the same strata will have the same Level Number.

nodes.name: LEIdentifierValue
nodes.documentation: The character string  that identifies the Legal Entity as designated by the Identifier Type.

nodes.name: LegalEntityType
nodes.documentation: A code that distinguishes one type of Legal Entity from another. Each separate Legal Entity Type has different data attribute and/or data relationship requirements.

nodes.name: OtherCountryInformationTBD
nodes.documentation: T.B.D.

nodes.name: LEAddress
nodes.documentation: Each occurrence of Legal Entity Address provides one Address for one Legal Entity for a designated period of time.  Each Legal Entity may have any number of Addresses which may be further qualified by the Address Role attribute.  The same Address may be used for any number of Individuals and/or Legal Entities.  The Individual  Address Start and End Date in conjunction with the Cycle Frequency attribute allows an address to be used for a specified period of time and then be repeated on a designated cycle, such as for a summer to be used during the summer months only on a yearly basis.
relationships: LegalEntityCommon[..1](Legal Entity can be contacted at Address)
Address[..1](Address issued as Legal Entity Address)

nodes.name: IdentifierStatus
nodes.documentation: Indicates the state of the LE Identifier at the Source 2

nodes.name: IDStartDate
nodes.documentation: The earliest date that a LE Identifier was in effect.

nodes.name: GeoRegion
nodes.documentation: Each occurrence of Geographic Region names and identifies one geographic area. The Geographic Area  may be within a single country or may extend across multiple countries as indicated by the Region Span attribute. Each Geographic Area  in turn has one of more Tax or Regulatory Authorities that oversee Legal Entities.

nodes.name: RatingName
nodes.documentation: The name of the specific rating.

nodes.name: FinancialInfoSubType
nodes.documentation: A free-form code that provides a lower-level breakdown of Financial Information regarding a Legal Entity.

nodes.name: LEtoLERelationship
nodes.documentation: Each occurrence of LE to LE Relationship defines a pair of two Legal Entities that are related to each other.
relationships: LERelationshipType[..1](Legal Entity Relationship Type defines LE to LE relationship)
ParentLegalEntityCommon->LegalEntityCommon[1..1](Legal Entity is parent to another Legal Entity)
ChildLegalEntityCommon->LegalEntityCommon[1..1](Legal Entity is child of another Legal Entity)

nodes.name: LECorporateEvent
nodes.documentation: Each occurrence of LE Corporate Event defines one Business Legal Entity effected by one Corporate Event. Each Corporate Event may impact one or multiple Business Legal Entities (e.g., merger, acquistion, etc.). If the Corporate Event impacts "n" number of LE's, then there will be "n" occurrence of LE Corporate Event, one for each Business LE impacted by the event.
relationships: CorporateEvent[..1](Corporate event is comprised of LE corporate events)
LegalEntityBusiness[..1](Legal Entity is impacted by Corporate events)

nodes.name: DocumentLinkID
nodes.documentation: The file ID,  URL or similar link to one LE Document.

nodes.name: IndividualFullName
nodes.documentation: The full name of this individual

nodes.name: MiddleName
nodes.documentation: The Middle name for this Individual.

nodes.name: AddressBlockType
nodes.documentation: For POSTAL ADDRESS, Indicates the sequence and structure for assembling the components into a Formatted Address Block. Default is "USPS."

nodes.name: BusinessHierarchySequenceNumber
nodes.documentation: A number that indicates the Category's "rank" within the Business Hierarchy. Allows the Category members of a Business Hierarchy to be arranged in a defined order.

nodes.name: RelationshipStartDate
nodes.documentation: The earliest date that a Legal Entity Relationship was in effect.

nodes.name: PostalAddressLine3
nodes.documentation: A free form text line containing the continuation of Postal Address, if multiple Address Lines are needed.

nodes.name: LEClassificationCategory
nodes.documentation: Each occurrence of Classification Category identifies one Legal Entity that has been categorized in a Category Grouping within a Classification Set.
relationships: LegalEntityCommon[..1](Legal Entity is categorized as Legal Entity Classification Category)

nodes.name: PostalAddressLine8
nodes.documentation: Supplemental Address Line.

nodes.name: CorporateEventLinkID
nodes.documentation: The file ID,  URL or similar link to the details of a specific Corporate Action Event. The details regarding the terms and conditions of the Corporate Action are stored outside the Legal Entity Data Domain but may be referenced by this ID Key or URL.

nodes.name: PostalAddressLine5
nodes.documentation: Supplemental Address Line.

nodes.name: Locality
nodes.documentation: Free form text but typically the city or geographic locale

nodes.name: UserEmail
nodes.documentation: A contact email adress for this person or entity

nodes.name: RegistrationStatus
nodes.documentation: Status of the entity with is registration authority.

nodes.name: CountryISOCode
nodes.documentation: The ISO 3166 code that identifies this Country.

nodes.name: RegistrationNumber
nodes.documentation: The Primary Registration Number for this Legal Entity. If registered in multiple locations, then additional Registration Numbers each stored as occurrence of Tax/Regulatory Identifier.

nodes.name: LERelationshipTypeName
nodes.documentation: Free form text describing a well-defined Entity to Entity Relationship Type.

nodes.name: TaxIdentifierValue
nodes.documentation: The value of the Tax Identifier for a LE.

nodes.name: LegalEntityIndividual
nodes.documentation: Each occurrence of Legal Entity - Individual identifies, names and supplies indicative information regarding one Natural Person. Each Individual is a human being as contrasted to a Legal Person, such as a Corporation having legal standing.

nodes.name: QuantitativeDataLink
nodes.documentation: The URL or similar link to the specific Quantitative Data for this LE.

nodes.name: BirthDate
nodes.documentation: The date of birth of an Individual.

nodes.name: ClassificationSetAbbreviation
nodes.documentation: A short name or abbreviation for this Classification Set 2.

nodes.name: GeoRegionType
nodes.documentation: An abbreviation or term that indicates the type or purpose of The Region.

nodes.name: BusinessCategoryName
nodes.documentation: The Name for this Category within this Business Hierachy.

nodes.name: OwnershipPercentage
nodes.documentation: The percent of ownership of a Secondary Legal Entity held by the Parent or Primary Legal Entity

nodes.name: DataSourceEventId
nodes.documentation: The ID assigned or provided by the Data Source to uniquely identify this Corporate Event.

nodes.name: LEBusinessHierarchy
nodes.documentation: NA

nodes.name: CorporateEvent
nodes.documentation: Each occurrence of Corporate Event identifies and provides summary information regarding one action, event, or activity occuring in the past or scheduled to occur in the future that has significant effect on one Business Legal Entity (e.g., Shareholder Meeting) or on multiple Business Legal Entities (e.g., merger or acquistion) as provided by one Data Source. The full terms, conditions, and detail informaton regarding the Corporate Event itself are not stored in Legal Entity Data Domain but are instead stored separately outside the domain space and are referenced by the Corporate Event ID attribute. The specific one or multiple Business LEs impacted by the Corporate Event are identified by separate occurrences of LE Corporate Event entity.

nodes.name: ClassificationSequenceNumber
nodes.documentation: A number that allows the Category members of a Classification Set to be arranged in a defined order.

nodes.name: BusinessHierarchyType
nodes.documentation: Describes the type or genre of this Business Hierarchy.

nodes.name: Salutation
nodes.documentation: The desired opening salutation when addressing or meeting an Individual.

nodes.name: GeoRegionName
nodes.documentation: The name for this Geographic Region.

nodes.name: LEAlternateName
nodes.documentation: Each occurrence of LE Alternate Name provides an additional name or alias in a designated language provided by a Data Source by which a Legal Entity is known.  Every LE has one Legal Entity Name attribute that is stored on the Legal Entity and may have "n" number of additional alternate names.

nodes.name: LegalEntityGroupName
nodes.documentation: A descriptive name for a LE Group.

nodes.name: AuthorityName
nodes.documentation: The name of the Tax or Regulatory Authority.

nodes.name: LEinCountry
nodes.documentation: Each occurrence of Legal Entry in Country identifies one Country that is related to one Legal Entity. The LE to Country Relationship Type Code indicates the type of relationship.
relationships: Country[..1](Legal Entity is located in Country)
LegalEntityCommon[..1](Country is location for LE in Country)

nodes.name: LEIdentifier
nodes.documentation: Each occurrence of LE Identifier contains one number, series of alphanumeric characters, or similar unique code provided by a Data Source that is used to identify one Legal Entity.  There may be multiple different LE Identifiers for each Legal Entity. Each different LE Identifier has a LE Identifier Type attribute that specifies the organization or body that establishes, assigns, and maintains that particular Identifier type.

nodes.name: AlternateNameAtSource
nodes.documentation: Alternate name by which this LE is known at the LE Identifier Source. <BLANK> if not applicable.

nodes.name: RegistrationDate
nodes.documentation: The initial Date of Registration

nodes.name: RatingStatus
nodes.documentation: The state of status of Rating score.

nodes.name: EventType
nodes.documentation: Indicates the type or category of Corporate Event.

nodes.name: LegalEntityBusiness
nodes.documentation: Each occurrence of Legal Entity - Business provides reference information specific to a corporation, partnership, proprietorship, trust, fund, or similar organization that has legal standing in the eyes of the law.

nodes.name: PrimaryListingSymbol
nodes.documentation: The listing symbol for the common stock of the entity on its primary exchange listing.

nodes.name: LEAddressStartDate
nodes.documentation: A Date on which a Legal Entity Address became active.

nodes.name: RelationshipRole
nodes.documentation: A code that explains how two LE's are related to each other.

nodes.name: TaxIDEndDate
nodes.documentation: The last date this Tax ID was assigned to this LE.

nodes.name: DependentorSubLocality
nodes.documentation: Free form text– in the US municipality

nodes.name: CorporateActionDescription
nodes.documentation: A short description of the Corporate Action Event.

nodes.name: LegalEntityGroupType
nodes.documentation: The ID of Data Source that provides this Financial Information.

nodes.name: ClassificationCategoryCode
nodes.documentation: A standard abbreviation for this Classification within this Classfication Set.

nodes.name: PostalAddressLine4
nodes.documentation: A free form text line containing the continuation of Postal Address, if multiple Address Lines are needed.

nodes.name: PrimaryTaxID
nodes.documentation: The ID of the Tax Identifier for primary identifying number for this LE for tax reporting and other legal purposes. When multiple tax identification numbers are required for the same LE, each Tax ID is also stored as a separate occurrence of Tax Identifier Entity.

nodes.name: RatingValue
nodes.documentation: A measure of the financial worthiness of a LE usually expressed as a letter and/or numeric score.

nodes.name: Title
nodes.documentation: The prefix title to formally address an Individual.

nodes.name: DataSourceLEKeyID
nodes.documentation: The ID of the Legal Entity represented by this Data Source. Provides additional information regarding a Data Source.

nodes.name: InfoStatus
nodes.documentation: The state of status of Financial Information regarding a Legal Entity.

nodes.name: LEGroupMember
nodes.documentation: Each occurrence of LE Group Member defines one Legal Entity that is a member of one LE Group. Each individual Legal Entity may belong to any number of different LE Groups. Conversely, each LE Group may have any number of Legal Entities as its members.

nodes.name: FiscalYearEnd
nodes.documentation: The Fiscal Year End Month of the LE.

nodes.name: InCategoryEndDate
nodes.documentation: The last date this LE was classified in this Category.

nodes.name: CountryName
nodes.documentation: The official name for a Country

nodes.name: PostalAddressLine2
nodes.documentation: A free form text line containing the continuation of Postal Address, if multiple Address Lines are needed.

nodes.name: CorporateEventStartDate
nodes.documentation: The earliest or beginning of period date this Financial Info had effect.

nodes.name: PostalAddressLine7
nodes.documentation: Supplemental Address Line.

nodes.name: DocumentDate
nodes.documentation: The date the Document was published.

nodes.name: DataSourceName
nodes.documentation: The text name describing this Data Source

nodes.name: LEIdentifierType
nodes.documentation: The type or genre of a Legal Entity Identifier.

nodes.name: DataManagementRoles
nodes.documentation: NA

nodes.name: LEStatus
nodes.documentation: The certification status of the LE.

nodes.name: BusinessType
nodes.documentation: The specific type of Business Legal Entity.

nodes.name: DissolutionDate
nodes.documentation: The Date the LE was officially dissolved.

nodes.name: RegionSpan
nodes.documentation:
Desigates if this Region is: 
    "WITHIN" one Cournty 
    "ACROSS" multiple Countries

nodes.name: SovereignOwnershipIndicator
nodes.documentation: Indicates if the LE is owned in whole or in part by a governing or sovereign authority.

nodes.name: EmailAddress
nodes.documentation: The email address associated with this Address ID

nodes.name: FormationDate
nodes.documentation: The Date of Incorporation or establishment.

nodes.name: TradingStatus
nodes.documentation: A code that indicates if a Legal Entity is tradable on any organized exchange.

nodes.name: FinancialInfo
nodes.documentation: Each occurrence of LE Financial Information provides time sensitive information about the monetary value or condition of a Legal Entity from a named Data Source. The information may consist of quantitative financial results, text information, or a web link to expanded information regarding one topic. The Financial Information Type and Sub Type attributes define the specific type of information provided in that occurrence.

nodes.name: Restrictions
nodes.documentation: Any restrictions against the LE.

nodes.name: StartofCountryRelationshipDate
nodes.documentation: The earliest date this Country was related to the Legal Entity.

nodes.name: InCategoryStartDate
nodes.documentation: The earliest date this LE was classified in this Category.

nodes.name: IndividualTaxID
nodes.documentation: The tax identification number of an Individual.

nodes.name: RelationshipEndDate
nodes.documentation: The latest date that a Legal Entity Relationship was in effect.

nodes.name: IdentifierName
nodes.documentation: The formal  name of a a specific Tax Identifier issued by the Tax Authority.

nodes.name: LegalEntityCommon
nodes.documentation: Each occurrence of Legal Entity - Common provides standard information applicable to every Legal Entity. Additional attributes describing a particular type or category of Legal Entity are dependent upon the Legal Entity Type attribute and are further defined by Legal Entity - Business and Legal Entity - Individual sub-type entities.

nodes.name: FaxNumber
nodes.documentation: A phone number used for faxing purposes.

nodes.name: UserName
nodes.documentation: The legal, official name for this person or entity

nodes.name: MembershipEndDate
nodes.documentation: The latest or end of period date in which a LE was last a member of a LE Group.

nodes.name: StateofDomicile
nodes.documentation: The State in which this LE is domiciled.

nodes.name: LegalEntitySubType
nodes.documentation: The sub-type of entity determines reporting requirements and hierarchy methodologies to be used

nodes.name: LERatings
nodes.documentation: Each occurrence of LE Ratings contains one time-sensitive score or evaluation of the credit worthiness of a Legal Entity that has been published by a Data Source, usually a credit rating agency.  Each LE Rating represents that Data Source's evaluation of qualitative and quantitative information about the LE including both public and in some cases, private information obtained by the rating agency.

nodes.name: RatingLegalEntityCommon
nodes.documentation: The Agency or organization supplying the ratings.

nodes.name: ListingStatus
nodes.documentation: A code that indicates if a Legal Entity is listed on any organized exchange as provided by Bloomberg.  This is the Bloomberg derived security status.  Based on the security's activity messages from pricing sources such as exchanges and marketplaces, Bloomberg creates five simple security statuses.  They are the following: AUCT - Security is in an auction phase.  Market participants are allowed to enter orders and quotes, but no trades are executed in the orderbook until the auction is complete.  HALT - Trading activity in the security is halted.  TRAD - Security is actively trading.  CLOS - Security has closed trading for the day.  OUT - Security is trading, but it is an off-hours period.

nodes.name: BusinessHierarchyDescription
nodes.documentation: A full text explanation of this Business Hierarchy.

nodes.name: DataSource
nodes.documentation: Each occurrence of Data Source names and identifies an orginating source of information or  data utilized within the FIMOD Legal Entity Data Model.

nodes.name: ClassificationCategoryName
nodes.documentation: The Name for this Category within this Classification Set.

nodes.name: FinancialInfoStartDate
nodes.documentation: The earliest or beginning of period date this Financial Info had effect.

nodes.name: EndofCountryRelationshipDate
nodes.documentation: The last date this Country was related to the Legal Entity.

nodes.name: Address
nodes.documentation: Each occurrence of Address provides one mailing, email, or web link address. The Address Type attribute designated the specific type of address. The Address Block Type specifies how individual address lines should be formatted for custom address line structuring in order to support different geographic address standards. One Address may be used or shared by any number of Individuals and/or for any number of Legal Entities.

nodes.name: TaxorRegIdentifier
nodes.documentation: Each occurrence of LE Tax Identifier provides one Tax or one Regulatory Identifier that has been assigned to one LE by one Tax Authority. Each Legal Entity may have 'N" number of Tax Identifiers.

nodes.name: Country
nodes.documentation: Each occurrence of Country names and identifies one Country that is of interest or has one or more relationships with a Legal Entity.

nodes.name: IndividualofInterest
nodes.documentation: THIS ENTITY HAS BEEN REMOVED FROM THE DATA MODEL AND IS PROVIDED FOR INFORMATION ONLY.

nodes.name: InRegionStartDate
nodes.documentation: The earliest date this Country was a member of this Region.

nodes.name: GeoLocationGPSCode
nodes.documentation: The GPS co-ordinates for this address

nodes.name: FamilyName
nodes.documentation: The Last name for this Individual.

nodes.name: AuthorityType
nodes.documentation: Indicates is this a "TAX" or "REG"regulator authority.

nodes.name: DocumentAuthor
nodes.documentation: The name of the Author of the Document

nodes.name: IdentifierCode
nodes.documentation: An abbreviation of a specific Tax Identifer issued by a Taxing Authority.

nodes.name: RatingStartDate
nodes.documentation: The earliest or beginning of period date this Rating had effect.

nodes.name: DocumentBriefDescription
nodes.documentation: A short synopsis of the Document contents.

nodes.name: City
nodes.documentation: Free form text but could utilize/define domain of values

nodes.name: GivenName
nodes.documentation: The Given first name for this Individual.

nodes.name: IndividualAddress
nodes.documentation: NA

nodes.name: DataTypes
nodes.documentation: A number of monetary units specified in a currency where the unit of currency is explicit or it may be implied.

nodes.name: AddressType
nodes.documentation: A code that indicates if this address is POSTAL, EMAIL, WEBKLINK, PHONE NUMBER, or FAX NUMBER 1.

nodes.name: LEGroup
nodes.documentation: Each occurrence of LE Group defines one group or collection consisting of one or more Legal Entities. Each individual Legal Entity may belong to any number of different LE Groups. Conversely, each LE Group may have any number of Legal Entities as its members.

nodes.name: PrimaryExchangeCode
nodes.documentation: Code that identifies the exchange on which the LE is listed.

nodes.name: RatingOutlookValue
nodes.documentation: The value of the Outlook Status as provided by the Data Source

nodes.name: WebLink
nodes.documentation: The URL of a web page contain address or address-related information.

nodes.name: IndividualPrivacyCode
nodes.documentation: A code that indicates the extent that Individual information that is shared or accessible.

nodes.name: AddressRole
nodes.documentation: Indicates how this address is being used in conjunction with this Legal Entity.

nodes.name: AddressBlockOverrideType
nodes.documentation: Allows override of standard Address Block Type for this Address. If blank, standard Address Block Type code used to format address.

nodes.name: StateofIncorporation
nodes.documentation: The state in which this LE was first incorporated.

nodes.name: LegalForm
nodes.documentation: The legal structure for the LE.  All developed countries have their own version of corporate law that defines the types of corporations that may be formed in their country anfd how they will be registered and regulated.

nodes.name: CountryRegionRelationship
nodes.documentation: Each occurrence of Country Region Relationship identifies one Country that participates in one Geographic Region.

nodes.name: PrimaryCurrency
nodes.documentation: The ISO Currency Code for the Primary Currency in which the LE trades and/or transacts.

nodes.name: DateTimeLastChanged
nodes.documentation: The date and time data was last changed on this Entity.

nodes.name: LEDocument
nodes.documentation: Each occurrence of LE Document references one piece of written, printed, or electronic matter pertaining to one Legal Entity. The Document may be stored in any number of different file formats (PDF, Word, Text, HTML, etc.) as indicated by the Document File Type attribute. The actual Document contents is provided via the Document Link ID attribute.

nodes.name: DocumentFileType
nodes.documentation: A code that indicates the file or technical format in which the Document is stored.

nodes.name: LEBusinessHierarchyCategory
nodes.documentation: Each occurrence of LE Business Hierarchy Category identifies, names, and defines one grouping or strata within a defined LE Business Hierarchy. Each Category represents one member of an ordered set that allows that category to be "above," "below," or "at the same level" as another Category member within that same Business Hierarchy.

nodes.name: DateTimeCreated
nodes.documentation: The date and time data was originally stored on this Entity.

nodes.name: FinancialInfoType
nodes.documentation: The specific type of Quantitative Data linked this LE.

nodes.name: ClassificationSet
nodes.documentation: Each occurrence of Classification Set provides one well-defined taxonomy, hierarchy, or listing structure for organizing and analyzing Legal Entities by grouping them into one or more Classification Categories. A Legal Entity may be categorized into any number of LE Classification Set/Categories via the LE Classification Category entity.

nodes.name: AddressStatus
nodes.documentation: A code that indicates if a particular Address is ACTIVE, PENDING, or CLOSED.

nodes.name: StateProvinceCanton
nodes.documentation: Domain of values well defined e.g. US State Codes, Canada Province Codes, etc.

nodes.name: LegalEntityIndicator
nodes.documentation: Indicates if the LE has been assigned an ISO 17442 Legal Entity Identifier.

nodes.name: Keyword
nodes.documentation: THIS ENTITY HAS BEEN REMOVED FROM THE DATA MODEL AND IS PROVIDED FOR INFORMATION ONLY.

nodes.name: BusinessHierarchyName
nodes.documentation: The text name of this Business Hierarchy.

nodes.name: AddressName
nodes.documentation: Address or building name

nodes.name: LERelationshipType
nodes.documentation: Each occurrence of LE Relationship Type name and defines a particular type of LE-to-LE Relationship that has well-defined meaning in the FIMOD. Relationships may be limited to two members only (one Legal Entity and its one Ultimate Parent) or any number of members (e.g., one Legal Entity and "N" other Legal Entities within a designated grouping).

nodes.name: DataFileCatalogEntry
nodes.documentation: THIS ENTITY HAS BEEN REMOVED FROM THE DATA MODEL AND IS PROVIDED FOR INFORMATION ONLY.

nodes.name: TaxorRegulatoryAuthority
nodes.documentation: Each occurrence of Tax/Regulatory Authority identifies and names one Tax Authority or one Regulatory Agency within one Country (e.g. US) or within one Region (eg., EU) and designates one type of Tax or Regulatory Identifier issued by that authority.

nodes.name: CycleFrequency
nodes.documentation: A code that can be used to recycle a Legal Entity Address on a recurring cycle. E.g., YEARLY for recurring Summer Address.

nodes.name: IDEndDate
nodes.documentation: The last date that a LE Identifer was in effect.

nodes.name: User
nodes.documentation: Each occurrence of User provides standard information applicable to an entity or person maintaining the data within the model

nodes.name: RatingsTypeCode
nodes.documentation: Allows different types of Rating from same agency. E.g., CURRENT, OUTLOOK, etc.

nodes.name: RatingEndDate
nodes.documentation: The latest or end of period date this Rating had effect.

nodes.name: DateTimeLastReviewed
nodes.documentation: The date and time this LE relationship was formally reviewed.

nodes.name: FinancialInfoQuantitativeValue
nodes.documentation: A numeric value of a particular type of LE Financial Information.

nodes.name: EventSequenceNumber
nodes.documentation: When the same Corporate Event impacts more then one Legal Entity e.g., merger, split-up, etc., this number allows the individual LE's to be ordered into a designated sequence within that Event.

nodes.name: TaxIDStartDate
nodes.documentation: The earliest date this Tax ID was assigned to this LE.

nodes.name: PostalAddressLine1
nodes.documentation: Free form text but typically contains first line of Postal Address.

nodes.name: LegalEntityRole
nodes.documentation: THIS ENTITY HAS BEEN REMOVED FROM THE DATA MODEL AND IS PROVIDED FOR INFORMATION ONLY.

nodes.name: PostalAddressLine6
nodes.documentation: Supplemental Address Line.

nodes.name: MembershipStartDate
nodes.documentation: The earliest or beginning of period date in which a LE was first a member of a LE Group.

nodes.name: RelationshipTypeNumberCode
nodes.documentation: Indicates how many LE's are allowed in this Relationship Type. 1

nodes.name: ClassificationCategory
nodes.documentation: Each occurrence of Classification Category defines and name one well-defined grouping within a Classification Set for analyzing Legal Entities.

nodes.name: FinancialInfoTextValue
nodes.documentation: A financial measure expressed in alphanumeric characters such as a Rating Code.

nodes.name: OfficialBusinessName
nodes.documentation: The Official Business Name, if different from the Legal Entity Name.

nodes.name: CorporateEventEndDate
nodes.documentation: The latest or end of period date this Financial Info had effect.

nodes.name: InRegionEndDate
nodes.documentation: The last date this Country was a member of this Region.
